org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman

Class PitermanConverter.NBW2DPWConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman.PitermanConverter.NBW2DPWConverter
  • Enclosing class:
    PitermanConverter

    static class PitermanConverter.NBW2DPWConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the real implementation of the determinization algorithm of Safra-Piterman construction.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NBW2DPWConverter(FSA aut)
      Construct this converter with default options.
      NBW2DPWConverter(FSA aut, Properties opt)
      Construct this converter with custom options.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsCompactSafraTree(CompactSafraTree tree)
      Checks if there is already a compact Safra tree same as a specified compact Safra tree.
      PitermanState getState(CompactSafraTree tree)
      Returns the state in the DPW corresponding to a specified compact Safra tree.
      CompactSafraTree getSuccessor(CompactSafraTree pred, java.lang.String symbol)
      Returns the successor of a compact Safra tree with respect to a symbol.
      FSA toDPW()
      Determinizes the input NBW as an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction.

      • getState

        public PitermanState getState(CompactSafraTree tree)
        Returns the state in the DPW corresponding to a specified compact Safra tree.
        Parameters:
        tree - a compact Safra tree
        Returns:
        the state in the DPW corresponding to tree

      • containsCompactSafraTree

        public boolean containsCompactSafraTree(CompactSafraTree tree)
        Checks if there is already a compact Safra tree same as a specified compact Safra tree.
        Parameters:
        tree - a compact Safra tree
        Returns:
        true if a tree same as tree already exists

      • getSuccessor

        public CompactSafraTree getSuccessor(CompactSafraTree pred,
                                     java.lang.String symbol)
        Returns the successor of a compact Safra tree with respect to a symbol.
        Parameters:
        pred - a compact Safra tree
        symbol - a symbol in the alphabet of the NBW to be determinized
        Returns:
        the successor of pred with respect to the symbol symbol

      • toDPW

        public FSA toDPW()
        Determinizes the input NBW as an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction.
        Returns:
        an equivalent DPW
